project.description: Updates the repo with backups of the Jenkins state.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: cd %JENKINS_HOME% set errorcode = git add . --ignore-errors set errorcode = git add -u --ignore-errors set errorcode = git add -A --ignore-errors set errorcode = git commit -am "Automated Jenkins commit" set errorcode = git push origin master

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd "$JENKINS_HOME" git add -A --ignore-errors git commit -am "Automated Jenkins commit" git push origin master
